name: Elemental Tower (Liéna EULOGE)
description:
Elemental tower is a 3D brawler game made by three programmers and four game designers in about two months !

Thanks to the mastery of 3 elements, destroy your enemies and become the champion of the arena!

Quickly change elements to create favorable and spectacular situations !

Credits

Game Designers :

Natacha Leonard
Quentin Croizit
Alex Le Roy
Jean Choupaÿ 

Game Programmers :

Liena Euloge
Aubin Van Olden Barneveld
Bastien Rappenecker
